ImageGenerator.title: AI Image Generator
ImageGenerator.subtitle: Create stunning visuals from your imagination
ImageGenerator.promptPlaceholder: A majestic dragon flying over a medieval castle at sunset, cinematic lighting, detailed, 8k

promptExamples.dragon: A majestic dragon flying over a medieval castle at sunset
promptExamples.cyberpunk: Cyberpunk cityscape with neon lights and flying cars
promptExamples.animeGirl: Cute anime girl in a magical forest with glowing mushrooms
promptExamples.spaceship: Futuristic spaceship landing on an alien planet with two suns
promptExamples.steampunk: Steampunk robot in a Victorian era workshop

ImageGenerator.previewPlaceholder: Your generated image will appear here
ImageGenerator.previewHint: Generate an image to see the preview

tips.title: Pro Tips for Best Results
tips.specific: Be specific about details, colors, and composition
tips.style: Include style references like 'in the style of [artist]'
tips.camera: Mention camera settings for realistic photos
tips.negative: Use negative prompts to exclude unwanted elements

errors.noPrompt: Please enter a description for your image
errors.generationFailed: Failed to generate image. Please try again.
